name: Lynx Creatlach
conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, stunned

trait.name: Special Equipment
text: Lynx's crystal eye is a magically shrunken crystal ball of true seeing. One of her teeth is a refashioned ring of mind shielding, while another has been magicked to place her under a permanent Nystul's magic aura spell, concealing the magic of these items and hiding her true nature from magic or features that can detect undead.

trait.name: Aversion of Fire
text: If Lynx takes fire damage, she has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of her next turn.

trait.name: Immutable Form
text: Lynx is immune to any spell or effect that would alter her form.

trait.name: Lightning Absorption
text: Whenever Lynx is subjected to lightning damage, she takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: Lynx has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Regeneration
text: Lynx regains 10 hit points at the start of her turn. If she takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of her next turn. Lynx's body is destroyed only if she starts her turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
text: Lynx is immune to effects that turn undead.

action.name: Shortsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

description:
Out on Loan. 
------
The powerful relics possessed by Lynx Creatlach and Sir Ursas (see the "Special Equipment" section of their stat blocks) have been granted to them by their diabolical masters, and are not meant to be claimed as treasure. If either agent is killed in the course of the adventure, their special equipment vanishes, returning to Bel or Zariel.
------
Source: Infernal Machine Rebuild p. 54
